text: I can see why this is the highest rated pharmacy in the area. The customer service is unmatched. Staff show true compassion and caring. I am a sick traveller looking for some relief from my asthma as it unexpectedly played up during my travels. She went above and beyond to help me considering I was not going to be in Singapore long. Truly grateful for their care whilst I‚Äôm in my state of sickness.

I have been a long time customer of Iris who works at Essentials. She introduced me to cordyceps and pearl powder and they have been such great products. I introduced them to my friends and they are now love and purchase them too. I continue to purchase regularly from her and also occasionally try new products! Thanks Iris! üëç

Amazing üëç service and extreme kindness of the people here in the shop. They took time to advice me very well. They even offered a trade in of my diabetes device to monitor blood sugar that was not compatible with the reading tablets in singapore. They offered me another system monitor for free in replacement of my old one. I just had to buy new local tablets.

The pharmacist was very kind and helpful in identifying what type of medicine I needed when I described to her my injury that I had gotten while traveling as a tourist. She was also able to find me other OTC medicines that I needed. Would highly recommend this pharmacy for anyone looking for medicine or help.
Iris served me today from Essential Pharmacy from People's Park Centre building.  She's full of warmth and care. A knowledgeable staff tooüòä
